data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Cachar to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Cachar, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Cachar, Assam, India to the gospel today.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Cachar, Assam, India.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
There are 1,736,600 people living in the county of Cachar. Only about 19,103 might be believers.
Father, remind your church in Cachar, Assam, India that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Murasing people. Make the Murasing people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Cachar to agree with you and with one another.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Cachar.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the county of Cachar, Assam, India has a population of 1,736,600.

We estimate Cachar has 19,103 people who might know Jesus, 21,071 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,696,427 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,696,427 who are far from you in Cachar, Assam, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
